Title: 🚀 Getting Started:
1. Download and install the Goose AI CLI using the instructions on the official website.
2. Set up your preferred LLM and API connections as needed.
3. Start using Goose AI by creating model call prompts (MCPs) to initiate your tasks.
4. Review the generated code for accuracy and integrate it into your project.
5. Join the Goose AI community for support and collaboration.
💡 Power-Ups:
1. Custom CLI commands: Create highly specific commands to automate complex tasks consistently. This adds significant value to repetitive workflows.
2. Extending functionality: Integrate custom MCPs and APIs to tailor Goose AI to unique workflows. This ensures the tool evolves with your individual needs and environment.
3. Leverage different LLMs: Experiment with various LLMs to discover the model best suited for your particular coding tasks and requirements. This allows for optimized performance and accuracy.
